history.narrative: Law 2-14 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 2-91, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on April 5, 1977 and May 3, 1977, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on May 23, 1977, it was assigned Act No. 2-42 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
